dr.evolution.coalescent
Class Skyline

java.lang.Object
  dr.evolution.coalescent.Skyline
All Implemented Interfaces:
Units, java.io.Serializable
public class Skyline
extends java.lang.Object
implements Units

Skyline plot derived from a strictly bifurcating tree or a coalescent interval. This class provides the "classic" skyline plot method by Pybus, Rambaut and Harvey 2000. Genetics 155:1429-1437, as well as the "generalized" skyline plot method described in Strimmer and Pybus. 2001. MBE submitted.

Version:
$Id: Skyline.java,v 1.15 2005/05/24 20:25:56 rambaut Exp $
Author:
Korbinian Strimmer
See Also:
Serialized Form

AICC

public static double AICC(double l,
                          int k,
                          int n)
Second-order Akaike (AICC) correction (Hurvich and Tsai 1989)

Parameters:
l - log-likelihood
k - number of inferred parameters
n - sample size
Returns:
l - k - (k(k+1))/(n - k - 1)
